Michael wrote:

> The best source to find that is the movie database. Here is Hayes's
> profile. http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0371230/

The problem is, just about anyone can update IMDB. The only source that says 
Hayes was in Shogun is Hayes himself. If someone at the IMDB wanted to verify 
it, they would contact Hayes and ask him if he was in it. All he has to do is 
say "yes."

Short of that, one has no recourse but to contact the studio and ask for 
25-year-old records on payments made for extras. And, frankly, I doubt they have 
those at this point. At any rate, being a guy who falls off the rigging is the 
type of job that would be given to a professional stuntman, not some random guy 
off the street extra. Not to mention it's hardly a claim to fame.

I think this claim, like so many others he makes, is pure BS.


Tony
